name: macro-meals
description: There is an endless amount of dieting information out there. What diet should I go on? Should I cut or bulk? How many calories should I aim for? And then... what recipes can I make in order to meet my goals. For a busy individual, this process can be tedious. We have taken the problem away. The user simply inputs their health goals and information about themselves, macro meals will convert this with a meal-plan and calorie requirements for you.
